name: Grab
comment: Hi. Please be informed that you should call your bank provider to inform them of your GrabPay registration with Grab apps if your GrabPay registration is unsuccessful. As certain banks need their card users to call them in once again for pre-authorization purpose prior to registering the card with our Grab apps. This applies for both Credit and Debit Card. Thank you.
